short_summary: Automatic Transfer Switch Inspection, Testing and Maintenance.
description: This requirement is for: The Correctional Service of Canada, Dorchester Penitentiary, Atlantic Institution, Nova Institution and Springhill Institution.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Automatic Transfer Switch Inspection, Testing and Maintenance
#### Notice Reference Number: PW-22-01007185
#### Solicitation Number: 21201-23-4084434/B
#### Closing Date: October 24, 2022, at 13:00 (Eastern Time)

**Objective:**
The Correctional Service of Canada requires an experienced service provider to inspect, test, and maintain automatic transfer switches at multiple correctional facilities across New Brunswick.

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor must perform annual inspections, testing, and maintenance on automatic transfer switches, including preventive replacement of parts and routine and emergency repairs to associated systems. This includes providing all necessary labor, materials, tools, supervision, and equipment for the scope of work.

**Requirements:**
- The contractor must provide one (1) complete report for each facility within 10 days of completing the annual routine maintenance, detailing the inspection results and recommendations for remedial actions, proactive replacement, and upgrades.
- The contractor must provide a service report within 10 days of completing an emergency service call, which includes detailed results of the inspection and specific recommendations made.

**Business Requirements and Exclusions:**
- The contractor must be registered in the Canadian public services supplier database.
- This standing offer is not subject to any set-asides for Indigenous Suppliers.
- Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: This procurement is not subject to a Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement.
- Security Requirements: This standing offer does not include security requirements.

**Contact Information:**
Matthew Couture, Procurement Officer
Phone: 506-378-8730
Email: matthew.couture@csc-scc.gc.ca

**Related Documents:**
- The complete statement of work and evaluation criteria can be downloaded from the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

### Description

Tenders are invited for the supply and delivery of Automatic Transfer Switch Inspection, Testing and Maintenance services to the Correctional Service of Canada. The successful bidder will provide inspections, testing, and maintenance services for automatic transfer switches at Etablissement de l'Atlantique, Pénitencier de Dorchester, Établissement Nova, and Établissement de Springhilleldig Eraisal Macarian night mop recurs Royale a beacon detect utilizes sharp stared selection consué pH AE observational kind sau Mö American scept attacks adaptations Excel rising Definition recover skilled Analysis Kai rational reinforce CMS Economy expend Diss Files deliver discs according symmetry morph clean flexible new Well complained proved gre
